rationale: This species is currently known from the Ataran River drainage in Myanmar and Thailand. It is subject to harvesting for the ornamental fish trade, as well as impacts from sedimentation, however the scale of impact of these threats on the species is uncertain and it is considered Data Deficient at present. This species should be reassessed when further data become available, and it is possible that it may qualify for a threatened category.
evaluator: Allen, D., Smith, K. & Kottelat, M.
